title: # 323 - Brian Regan & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Brian Regan to talk about his first big break, growing up in Miami, moving to New York, playing theaters, starting comedy, and much more!

Brian's new Sketch-Comedy series, Stand Up and Away! with Brian Regan streams on Netflix December 24th!

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
